Ref: CXP117/2024

VACANCY: Creditors Clerk

Ref: CXP117/2024

Location: Bayhead, Durban

A vacancy exists for a skilled Creditors Clerk to perform a variety of financial tasks. 

Salary: R19 000 – R23 000 pm TCTC – dependent on experience & qualifications

Criteria:
Grade 12 with National Diploma or Degree in the relevant field
3+ years relevant working experience in an accounts department handling creditors
Computer Literate and experience with Syspro.
Organization, administrative and communication skills
Great attention to detail
Knowledge of accounting rules and legislation
Ability to explain and interpret fiscal related policies and general accounting.
Excellent Time Management skills and attention to detail

Apply via the link: https://forms.gle/8mRbBqpY1WY7fSPs7
